an3.36:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kayena duccaritam carati, vacaya duccaritam carati, manasa duccaritam carati.
an3.36:1.4: So kayena duccaritam caritva, vacaya duccaritam caritva, manasa duccaritam caritva kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati.
an3.36:1.5: Tamenam, bhikkhave, nirayapala nanabahasu gahetva yamassa ranno dassenti:
an3.36:1.6: ‘ayam, deva, puriso amatteyyo apetteyyo asamanno abrahmanno, na kule jetthapacayi.
an3.36:2.1: Tamenam, bhikkhave, yamo raja pathamam devadutam samanuyunjati samanugahati samanubhasati:
an3.36:2.2: ‘ambho, purisa, na tvam addasa manussesu pathamam devadutam patubhutan’ti?
an3.36:3.2: ‘ambho purisa, na tvam addasa manussesu itthim va purisam va asitikam va navutikam va vassasatikam va jatiya jinnam gopanasivankam bhoggam dandaparayanam pavedhamanam gacchantam aturam gatayobbanam khandadantam palitakesam vilunam khallitasiram valitam tilakahatagattan’ti?
an3.36:4.2: ‘ambho, purisa, tassa te vinnussa sato mahallakassa na etadahosi—
an3.36:4.3: ahampi khomhi jaradhammo jaram anatito, handaham kalyanam karomi, kayena vacaya manasa’ti?
an3.36:5.2: ‘ambho, purisa, pamadataya na kalyanamakasi kayena vacaya manasa.
an3.36:5.3: Taggha tvam, ambho purisa, tatha karissanti yatha tam pamattam.
an3.36:5.4: Tam kho pana te etam papakammam neva matara katam, na pitara katam, na bhatara katam, na bhaginiya katam, na mittamaccehi katam, na natisalohitehi katam, na devatahi katam, na samanabrahmanehi katam;
an3.36:5.5: atha kho tayavetam papakammam katam, tvannevetassa vipakam patisamvedissasi’ti.
an3.36:6.1: Tamenam, bhikkhave, yamo raja pathamam devadutam samanuyunjitva samanugahitva samanubhasitva, dutiyam devadutam samanuyunjati samanugahati samanubhasati:
an3.36:6.2: ‘ambho purisa, na tvam addasa manussesu dutiyam devadutam patubhutan’ti?
an3.36:6.6: ‘ambho purisa, na tvam addasa manussesu itthim va purisam va abadhikam dukkhitam balhagilanam, sake muttakarise palipannam semanam, annehi vutthapiyamanam, annehi samvesiyamanan’ti?
an3.36:7.2: ‘ambho purisa, tassa te vinnussa sato mahallakassa na etadahosi:
an3.36:7.3: “ahampi khomhi byadhidhammo byadhim anatito, handaham kalyanam karomi kayena vacaya manasa”’ti?
an3.36:8.2: ‘ambho purisa, pamadataya na kalyanamakasi kayena vacaya manasa.
an3.36:8.3: Taggha tvam, ambho purisa, tatha karissanti yatha tam pamattam.
an3.36:8.4: Tam kho pana te etam papakammam neva matara katam, na pitara katam, na bhatara katam, na bhaginiya katam, na mittamaccehi katam, na natisalohitehi katam, na devatahi katam, na samanabrahmanehi katam;
an3.36:8.5: atha kho tayavetam papakammam katam. Tvannevetassa vipakam patisamvedissasi’ti.
an3.36:9.1: Tamenam, bhikkhave, yamo raja dutiyam devadutam samanuyunjitva samanugahitva samanubhasitva, tatiyam devadutam samanuyunjati samanugahati samanubhasati:
an3.36:9.2: ‘ambho purisa, na tvam addasa manussesu tatiyam devadutam patubhutan’ti?
an3.36:10.2: ‘ambho purisa, na tvam addasa manussesu itthim va purisam va ekahamatam va dvihamatam va tihamatam va uddhumatakam vinilakam vipubbakajatan’ti?
an3.36:11.2: ‘ambho purisa, tassa te vinnussa sato mahallakassa na etadahosi—
an3.36:11.3: ahampi khomhi maranadhammo maranam anatito, handaham kalyanam karomi kayena vacaya manasa’ti?
an3.36:12.2: ‘ambho purisa, pamadataya na kalyanamakasi kayena vacaya manasa.
an3.36:12.3: Taggha tvam, ambho purisa, tatha karissanti yatha tam pamattam.
an3.36:12.4: Tam kho pana te etam papakammam neva matara katam, na pitara katam, na bhatara katam, na bhaginiya katam, na mittamaccehi katam, na natisalohitehi katam, na devatahi katam, na samanabrahmanehi katam;
an3.36:12.5: atha kho tayavetam papakammam katam. Tvannevetassa vipakam patisamvedissasi’”ti.
an3.36:13.1: Tamenam, bhikkhave, yamo raja tatiyam devadutam samanuyunjitva samanugahitva samanubhasitva tunhi hoti.
an3.36:13.2: Tamenam, bhikkhave, nirayapala pancavidhabandhanam nama karanam karonti.
an3.36:13.3: Tattam ayokhilam hatthe gamenti. Tattam ayokhilam dutiyasmim hatthe gamenti. Tattam ayokhilam pade gamenti. Tattam ayokhilam dutiyasmim pade gamenti. Tattam ayokhilam majjhe urasmim gamenti.
an3.36:13.4: So tattha dukkha tibba khara katuka vedana vediyati, na ca tava kalam karoti yava na tam papakammam byantihoti.
an3.36:14.1: Tamenam, bhikkhave, nirayapala samvesetva kudharihi tacchanti.
an3.36:14.2: So tattha dukkha tibba khara katuka vedana vediyati, na ca tava kalam karoti yava na tam papakammam byantihoti.
an3.36:15.1: Tamenam, bhikkhave, nirayapala uddhampadam adhosiram gahetva vasihi tacchanti …pe…
an3.36:15.2: tamenam, bhikkhave, nirayapala rathe yojetva adittaya bhumiya sampajjalitaya sajotibhutaya sarentipi paccasarentipi …pe…
an3.36:15.3: tamenam, bhikkhave, nirayapala mahantam angarapabbatam adittam sampajjalitam sajotibhutam aropentipi oropentipi …pe…
an3.36:15.4: tamenam, bhikkhave, nirayapala uddhampadam adhosiram gahetva tattaya lohakumbhiya pakkhipanti, adittaya sampajjalitaya sajotibhutaya. (…)
an3.36:15.5: So tattha phenuddehakam paccamano sakimpi uddham gacchati, sakimpi adho gacchati, sakimpi tiriyam gacchati.
an3.36:15.6: So tattha dukkha tibba khara katuka vedana vediyati, na ca tava kalam karoti yava na tam papakammam byantihoti.
an3.36:18.2: ‘ye kira, bho, loke papakani kammani karonti te evarupa vividha kammakarana kariyanti.
an3.36:18.3: Aho vataham manussattam labheyyam, tathagato ca loke uppajjeyya araham sammasambuddho, tancaham bhagavantam payirupaseyyam.
an3.36:18.4: So ca me bhagava dhammam deseyya, tassa caham bhagavato dhammam ajaneyyan’ti.
an3.36:18.5: Tam kho panaham, bhikkhave, na annassa samanassa va brahmanassa va sutva evam vadami, api ca kho, bhikkhave, yadeva me samam natam samam dittham samam viditam tadevaham vadamiti.
